body_html: sparse_softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits subtracts the max of the logits before calculating the cross entropy, for numerical stability. could that be the reason you're getting different results?
body_text: sparse_softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits subtracts the max of the logits before calculating the cross entropy, for numerical stability.  could that be the reason you're getting different results?
body: sparse_softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits [subtracts the max of the logits](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/754048a0453a04a761e112ae5d99c149eb9910dd/tensorflow/core/kernels/sparse_xent_op.h#L201) before calculating the cross entropy, for numerical stability.  could that be the reason you're getting different results?
